Z

zapNewImage() - Method in class jpo.Camera
deletes all entries in the new Image.
zapOldImage() - Method in class jpo.Camera
deletes all entries in the new Image.
zapThumbnails() - Method in class jpo.SettingsDialog
brings up an are you sure dialog and then zaps all the thumbnauil images
zapThumbnailsJButton - Variable in class jpo.SettingsDialog
button to delete all thumbnails
zeroJButton - Variable in class jpo.CameraEditor
button to zero the old image of the camera
zoomIn() - Method in class jpo.PicturePane
Multifilies the scale factor so that paint() method scales the image larger.
zoomOut() - Method in class jpo.PicturePane
method that zooms out on the image leaving the center where it is.
zoomToFit() - Method in class jpo.PicturePane
this method sets the desired scaled size of the ScalablePicture to the size of the JPanel and fires off a createScaledPictureInThread request if the ScalablePicture has been loaded or is ready.
